name: Clark Ben
description: Am straight,honest,caring,hardworking and above all God fearing.Always willing to give out my heart to the woman who knows how best to preserve it till the end of time.Love is not just about finding the right person but creating right relationship.It’s not about how much love you have in the beginning but how much love you build at the end.I need a woman who is loving,homely and God fearing too.A woman who will bring everlasting joy to my life and in return i will make her the happiest woman on earth.I will shower her with unending love.you can drop me a message if i sound interesting to you.catch you.
